statements: SELECT * FROM recycling_points WHERE resident_id = 1;
SELECT resident_id, points_earned FROM recycling_points ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT recycling_activity FROM recycling_points;
SELECT * FROM recycling_points WHERE points_earned > 50;
SELECT resident_id, recycling_activity FROM recycling_points WHERE points_earned < 20 ORDER BY resident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_points WHERE resident_id = 1 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT resident_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM recycling_points GROUP BY resident_id HAVING total_points > 10;
SELECT MAX(points_earned) AS max_points, COUNT(*) AS total_residents FROM recycling_points;
SELECT resident_id, recycling_activity FROM recycling_points ORDER BY resident_id ASC, recycling_activity DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_points WHERE recycling_activity LIKE 'Plastic%' AND points_earned > 5;
SELECT * FROM residents;
SELECT name, points FROM residents;
SELECT resident_id, name FROM residents ORDER BY resident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_activities WHERE points_earned > 10;
SELECT activity_name, points_earned FROM recycling_activities WHERE resident_id = 100;
SELECT name, points FROM residents WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE points < 50
SELECT r.name, ra.activity_name FROM residents r JOIN recycling_activities ra ON r.resident_id = ra.resident_id
SELECT r.name, ra.activity_name, ra.points_earned FROM residents r LEFT JOIN recycling_activities ra ON r.resident_id = ra.resident_id
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE resident_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM residents;
SELECT name, address FROM residents WHERE points_earned > 100;
SELECT center_id, location FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT resident_id, activity_type, points_awarded FROM recycling_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY points_awarded DESC;

SELECT r.name, ra.points_awarded, rc.location FROM residents r JOIN recycling_activities ra ON r.resident_id = ra.resident_id JOIN recycling_centers rc ON ra.center_id = rc.center_id WHERE ra.points_awarded > 50 AND rc.recycling_capacity > 1000;
SELECT name, points_earned FROM residents ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers WHERE recycling_capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT resident_id, center_id, activity_type FROM recycling_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' AND points_awarded >= 20 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM recycling_centers;

SELECT residents.name, recycling_centers.location, recycling_activities.activity_type FROM residents JOIN recycling_activities ON residents.resident_id = recycling_activities.resident_id JOIN recycling_centers ON recycling_activities.center_id = recycling_centers.center_id ORDER BY residents.name ASC, recycling_activities.activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM residents
SELECT name, address FROM recycling_centers
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM recycling_activities
SELECT points, resident_id, activity_id FROM recycling_points
SELECT address, name FROM residents
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE resident_id = 1;
SELECT name FROM residents WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT center_id, name FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name FROM recycling_activities;
SELECT resident_id, SUM(points) as total_points FROM recycling_points GROUP BY resident_id ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM residents;
SELECT name, address FROM residents WHERE points_earned > 100;
SELECT bin_id, location, capacity FROM recycling_bins ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT activity_date, points_awarded FROM recycling_activities WHERE resident_id = 12345;
SELECT redemption_date, redeemed_points FROM points_redemption WHERE resident_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, address FROM residents WHERE resident_id = 3
SELECT location, capacity FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM recycling_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT redemption_id, resident_id, redeemed_points FROM points_redemption ORDER BY redemption_date DESC
